name: Cheese Wars
description:
Very First version prototype of the real time strategy PVP Tower Defense with minion summoning. CHEESE WARS.

==== VERSION 0.4 UPDATE ====
This version of 'Cheese Wars!' contains a number of useful updates. These include:
- A complete gameplay loop! Players can now win/lose.
- Players can now earn additional gold when killing an enemy unit.
- 2 types of turrets (pick them by using the 1/2 keys)
- Spawnable minions (right-click to spawn a unit to attack your opponent)
- Workiing match making
- Wave based enemies
- Camera movement (press 'f' to swap your view to your opponent's
